name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closefox - Mass Add IG Close Friends

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click to add all Instagram followers as close friends. Import users to bulk add close friends.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn your Instagram followers into your close friends.

v1.1.2 UPDATE
- add remove friends feature

v1.1.0 UPDATE
- add max users in a batch (default value is 10)
- add resume task in the history page

v1.0.1 UPDATE
- fix the adding progress issue
- make adding close friends more stable

# FEATURES

✓ Auto Mass add close friends for IG.
✓ One click to import user ids from csv file.
✓ Add close friends by user ids.
✓ High speed mass close friends.

## Is there a maximum number of IG Close Friends?

PLEASE DON'T SPAM!
We have received feedback from users that they can only add up to 7,500 friends. This limit may be related to your account.

There are also users who report that they can only add a small number of close friends per day.

If you get a 400 error, change the batch number to one user at a time. If you still get the error, it means that your account has reached the limit for adding friends, or your add close friends feature has been blocked by Instagram. 

# FAQ

# FAMILY TOOLS

you can visit our family tools for export user ids

- IG Follower Export, export followers/following
- IG Comment Export - export comment users

# DATA PRIVACY

All data is processed in your local computer, never passing through our web server, and no one knows what you exported.
